text: Thomas Waller (fl. 1421–1435) of Guildford, Surrey, was an English politician. His wife was named Joan. He was a Member (MP) of the Parliament of England for Guildford in May 1421, December 1421 and 1435. ==References== Category:Year of birth missing Category:Year of death missing Category:English MPs May 1421 Category:Members of Parliament for Guildford Category:English MPs December 1421 Category:English MPs 1435
title: Thomas Waller (fl. 1421–1435)
